title: Welcome Page loads with animated gradient background and voice orb
description: Verify that the Welcome Page renders correctly with animated gradient background and interactive animated voice orb visible.

steps.description: Navigate to the Welcome Page
Check the animated gradient background is visible and animating
Verify the interactive animated voice orb is present and displays animation

title: Toggle interaction modes between Voice and Manual
description: Verify that the user can toggle between Voice Mode and Manual Mode, and the UI updates accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to the Welcome Page
Toggle interaction mode from default to Manual Mode
Verify Manual Mode UI elements (touch-friendly buttons) become visible
Toggle interaction mode back to Voice Mode
Verify Voice Mode UI elements (voice orb) are visible and Manual Mode elements are hidden

title: Navigate from Welcome Page to Check-In flow using Manual Mode
description: Validate that selecting 'Check-In' option from the Welcome Page in Manual Mode proceeds to guest identification step.

steps.description: Switch to Manual Mode on Welcome Page
Click on 'Check-In' button
Verify transition to guest identification screen

title: Navigate from Welcome Page to Book Room flow using Voice Mode
description: Verify that selecting 'Book Room' option via Voice Mode triggers correct UI state transition and displays available rooms.

steps.description: Switch to Voice Mode on Welcome Page
Use voice command to select 'Book Room' option
Verify Room Selection Page is displayed with room options

title: Room Selection Page displays rooms with correct data
description: Verify the Room Selection Page shows all available rooms with images, prices, and amenities as provided by backend mock services.

steps.description: Navigate to Room Selection Page via booking workflow
Check each room card displays image
Verify price for each room is accurate and matches backend data
Verify amenities are correctly listed for each room

title: Select room and proceed to payment in Booking workflow
description: Validate that selecting a room triggers transition to payment section with correct cost and tax breakdown.

steps.description: Select a room from Room Selection Page
Ensure payment screen is displayed
Verify displayed billing includes room cost and applicable taxes

title: Simulate card payment and verify payment acceptance
description: Test that the payment simulation accepts input and successfully processes payment without errors.

steps.description: Input card details in payment simulation
Submit payment
Verify payment success confirmation is displayed

title: Perform ID scanning simulation with visual progress feedback
description: Ensure that ID scanning simulation displays progress bar and completion feedback correctly during Check-In workflow.

steps.description: Start ID scanning simulation during Check-In
Verify visual progress bar appears and updates visually
Confirm completion feedback is shown when scanning finishes

title: Verify room key dispensing simulation after successful payment
description: Check that the simulated hardware correctly dispenses a room key after payment completion in both Check-In and Booking flows.

steps.description: Complete payment simulation successfully
Trigger room key dispensing simulation
Verify room key dispensing visual and status confirmation is displayed

title: Check backend state machine drives frontend UI correctly
description: Validate that all UI state transitions strictly follow backend state machine events without frontend logic overrides.

steps.description: Interact with UI to trigger various state transitions
Confirm UI updates only occur based on backend emitted states and intents
Verify no premature or unsanctioned frontend logic overrides UI state

title: Complete end-to-end Check-In workflow successfully
description: Verify the complete Check-In guest flow from Welcome Page through ID scanning, reservation verification, payment, and room key dispensing completes without errors.

steps.description: Select 'Check-In' on Welcome Page
Complete guest identification and simulated ID scanning
Verify reservation is correctly verified
Complete payment simulation if required
Verify room key dispensing simulation occurs

title: Complete end-to-end Room Booking workflow successfully
description: Verify the full room booking flow from Welcome Page selection, room browsing, payment processing, and final room key issuance completes correctly.

steps.description: Select 'Book Room' on Welcome Page
Browse and select desired room
Complete payment simulation
Verify delivery of room key via simulation

title: Error handling for ID scanning simulation timeout
description: Verify the system handles simulated ID scanning timeouts gracefully and shows error feedback to the guest.

steps.description: Initiate ID scanning simulation and trigger timeout condition
Verify an appropriate error message or banner is displayed
Ensure user can retry the ID scanning process

title: Error handling for payment failure
description: Simulate payment failure and verify system displays clear error message and allows user to retry or cancel payment.

steps.description: Enter invalid or failing payment details in payment simulation
Submit payment
Check error message indicating payment failure is shown
Verify options to retry payment or cancel are available

title: Verify Manual Mode action buttons are accessible and responsive
description: Check that all Manual Mode buttons (Check-In, Book Room, Help) on Welcome Page are present, visible, and respond to user taps correctly.

steps.description: Switch to Manual Mode on Welcome Page
Verify visibility of Check-In, Book Room, and Help buttons
Tap each manual action button
Verify UI transitions to corresponding screens

title: Validate presence and correct functioning of Back button across pages
description: Validate that the Back button is present on all relevant pages and returns user to previous UI state as expected.

steps.description: Navigate from Welcome Page to Room Selection Page
Verify Back button is visible
Press Back button
Confirm return to Welcome Page

title: Ensure global state updates correctly on user actions emitting intents
description: Verify that all user interaction intents (from UI inputs) are emitted properly to backend and that global state updates reflect these intents accurately.

steps.description: Perform user actions such as selecting rooms, toggling modes, confirming payments
Check that intents emitted from frontend correspond exactly to user actions
Verify global UI state updates strictly follow backend responses
